testCase.name: FormStepComponent should render the correct number of form step items when formStepItems is not empty
FormStepComponent should render the correct label for each form step item when formStepItems is not empty
FormStepComponent should render the correct index for each form step item when formStepItems is not empty
FormStepComponent should handle empty formStepItems array and render default form step item
FormStepComponent should handle step value greater than the number of formStepItems and render last form step item
